dcterms:creator: A. Kendall
M. Grimes
R. Cipolla
dcterms:description: The Cambridge Landmark dataset contains outdoor sequences. The appearance of large spatial content, partial occlusions, and urban clutter make localization over this dataset quite challenging. However, it provides a good test-bed to manifest the importance of temporal information (recurrent network), as localization approaches that rely on a single image are not reliable enough.
dcterms:title: Cambridge Landmark dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Shotton
B. Glocker
C. Zach
S. Izadi
A. Criminisi
A. W. Fitzgibbon
dcterms:description: The 7-Scenes dataset contains large variation in camera height and is used for testing indoor scenes. It is publicly available and provides a challenging environment for image-based localization.
dcterms:title: 7-Scenes dataset

dcterms:creator: Z. Zhang
H. Rebecq
C. Forster
D. Scaramuzza
dcterms:description: The Multi-FoV synthetic dataset includes various camera optics and is used to evaluate the performance of localization methods under different field-of-view conditions. It allows for a fair comparison of different camera models.
dcterms:title: Multi-FoV synthetic dataset
